data.actual_result: The bottom most category is too close to the user bar and there is no padding between the user bar and category area
data.expected_result: The channel list should show up with some space/padding between the user bar and channel category
data.short_description: there is no padding between the user bar and the bottom most collapsed channel category
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with categories enabled - Collapse the bottom most category - Scroll down to the bottom of the channel list
